hicpp-no-malloc.description:
Description

The
hicpp-no-malloc
check is an alias, please see
cppcoreguidelines-no-malloc
for more information.
It enforces the
rule 5.3.2
.
hicpp-no-malloc.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
